sub_fields.label: API key
sub_fields.name: map_api_key
sub_fields.instructions:
Activates the Google "Maps JavaScript API" and "Geocoding API".
Create an API key as instructed https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/javascript/get-api-key#get-an-api-key to enable Google Maps on your pages.
